snippet: The organization, a nonprofit based in Queens whose former executive was disfigured while investigating missing money, cited financial woes.
abstract: Healing Arts Initiative, Queens-based arts charity, closes suddenly and is expected to file for bankruptcy; organization, founded in 1969, was roiled by disfiguring attack on director D Alexandra Dyer in 2015 that ultimately exposed significant embezzlement scheme.
lead_paragraph: The organization, a nonprofit based in Queens whose former executive was disfigured while investigating missing money, cited financial woes.

headline.main: Charity Whose Leader Was Attacked With Lye Closes
headline.print_headline: Charity Closes After Trouble With Finances and Lye Attack
